title: Nanoparticles deliver gene to treat rare lung disease
content: Tuning the same delivery method used in the two mRNA COVID-19 vaccines could work to reduce cysts from a rare lung disease called lymphangioleiomyomatosis.
description: Tuning the same delivery method used in the two mRNA COVID-19 vaccines could work to reduce cysts from a rare lung disease called lymphangioleiomyomatosis.
